responses.rationale: The segment describes the discovery of the virus, not a capability or preparedness measure.
The segment describes actions taken (slaughtered, buried, restricted exports) which are response measures/safeguards, without explicit calming keywords.
The segment states a historical fact about culling, not a current capability or preparedness measure.
The segment states a population statistic, not a capability or preparedness measure.
The segment describes a past outbreak and action, not a current capability or preparedness measure.
The segment describes outbreaks and culling in other locations, not a capability or preparedness measure by the subject.

The segment describes actions ('put up signs') and a future possibility ('eggs will go back to being free-range'), without explicit calming keywords.
